nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.conversion

Class FixedLengthNumberConverter<T extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.conversion.FixedLengthNumberConverter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Converter<T>

    public class FixedLengthNumberConverter<T extends java.lang.Number>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Converter<T>
    Converts a string to number with fixed position decimals. Example: 1234.56 -> 000123456 with precision = 9 and scale = 2
    Author:
    luis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
